scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn prepare:mainnet && bash -c 'source .env || true && graph deploy --studio $SUBGRAPH_MAINNET'
scripts.deploy:goerli: yarn prepare:goerli && bash -c 'source .env || true && graph deploy --studio $SUBGRAPH_GOERLI'
scripts.deploy:gnosis: yarn prepare:gnosis && bash -c 'source .env || true && graph deploy --studio $SUBGRAPH_GNOSIS'
scripts.deploy:arbitrum: yarn prepare:arbitrum && bash -c 'source .env || true && graph deploy --studio $SUBGRAPH_ARBITRUM'
scripts.deploy:avalanche: yarn prepare:avalanche && bash -c 'source .env || true && graph deploy --studio $SUBGRAPH_AVALANCHE'
scripts.deploy:bsc: yarn prepare:bsc && bash -c 'source .env || true && graph deploy --studio $SUBGRAPH_BSC'
scripts.deploy:polygon: yarn prepare:polygon && bash -c 'source .env || true && graph deploy --studio $SUBGRAPH_POLYGON'
